Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial divergent observation listing street signs, building names, and general architectural and traffic-clue impressions without a firm hypothesis.

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent verification of a specific location hypothesis using detailed transit signage and lookup of 'Schelling-Salon' address.

Depth-First.Explanation: Final confirmation of the precise address at fine granularity.
